name: Death is a Party
description:
This game was made in three hours for TriJam #49, with the theme "Death is not the end".

You are a little ghost who just wants to party! Wake up all your friends by visiting their graves before dawn.

All the source code is available on GitHub.

Color Palette: NYX8 PALETTE by Javier Guerrero

Font: DPComic Font by codeman38

Music: Inspector Unvisible by Lobo Loco
